name: ZINKLE
description:
So simple, so beautiful.  Squiggles animating along Blobs. A classic Dr Abstract where collectors can edit the paths to make an endless dance of art in dual dynamics!

Press on or off the path to toggle the controls. Press to add point, double tap controls to change. Press and hold to remove point. These controls are built into the ZIM JavaScript Canvas Framework.To find out more about ZIM and NFTs see https://zimjs.com/nft.

This could be the most sublime interactive NFT from the Founder of ZIM and inaugural member of the Gadget Minters. Akin to a Slinky, Zinkle is a digital toy to last the ages. 

For more info on the Gadget Minters visit https://zimjs.com/gadgetminters. 

Follow Dr Abstract on Facebook at https://facebook.com/gadgetminters.
